Description: 2015 GIBSON LES PAUL Special Double Cut Cherry Finish - P90's - Les Paul's 100th !!! The solid mahogany neck with Slim Taper profile and rosewood fretboard of the 2015 Les Paul Special offer a perfect blend of speed and comfort. Dual P-90 Soapbar Alnico Slug Pickups pack a wide variety of tones via a 3-way switch and master volume and tone pots. The 2015 upgrades included an adjustable nut, buffed fretboard, commemorative headstock hologram and PLEK factory setup. Includes 100th Commemorative Gold Hard Shell Case !!!
